mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture (title, description, link, date, time, instructor_id) VALUES (#{lectureTitle}, #{lectureDesc}, #{lectureLink}, #{lectureDate}, #{lectureTime}, #{instructorId})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS lectureId, title AS lectureTitle, description AS lectureDesc, link AS lectureLink, date AS lectureDate, time AS lectureTime, instructor_id AS instructorId FROM lecture WHERE date >= DATE(NOW()) ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT id AS lectureId, title AS lectureTitle, description AS lectureDesc, link AS lectureLink, date AS lectureDate, time AS lectureTime, instructor_id AS instructorId FROM lecture WHERE date < DATE(NOW()) ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT lecture.id AS lectureId, title AS lectureTitle, description AS lectureDesc, link AS lectureLink, date AS lectureDate, time AS lectureTime, instructor_id AS instructorId FROM lecture LEFT JOIN user ON lecture.instructor_id = user.id WHERE user.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT id AS lectureId, title AS lectureTitle, description AS lectureDesc, link AS lectureLink, date AS lectureDate, time AS lectureTime, instructor_id AS instructorId FROM lecture WHERE id = #{lectureId}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET lectureTitle = #{lectureTitle} WHERE lectureId = #{lectureId}
